body.name: Transformers Legacy United Deluxe Class Rescue Bots Universe Autobot Chase, 5.5-inch Converting Action Figure, 8+
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 16 mins
features: RESCUE BOTS UNIVERSE AUTOBOT CHASE ACTION FIGURE: This 5.5-inch (14 cm) Rescue Bots Universe Autobot Chase toy features deco and detail inspiration from the Transformers: Rescue Bots animated series
2-IN-1 CONVERTING TRANSFORMERS TOY: Transformers action figure converts from robot toy to police car toy in 18 steps
AWESOME ACCESSORIES: This Rescue Bots Universe Autobot Chase Transformers figure comes with 2 attachable arm blasters and a 3-piece Energon claw accessory. Accessories attach in both modes
ARTICULATED FOR PLAY AND DISPLAY: Transformers figures feature articulated heads, arms, and legs for action poses

CELEBRATE THE LEGACY: Transformers Legacy United honors 40 years of Transformers animated history! Collect other Legacy: United figures to unite your collection (each sold separately, subject to availability)
GIFT TRANSFORMERS COLLECTIBLES: This Rescue Bots Universe Autobot Chase action figure toy makes a great collectible figure gift for any Transformers fan
body.description: Unite your favorite characters from across the world of Transformers robots into your collection with the Transformers Legacy United Deluxe Class Rescue Bots Universe Autobot Chase action figure! This 5.5-inch Rescue Bots Universe Autobot Chase action figure converts between robot and police car modes in 18 steps. Gear up for battle with the included 2 arm blasters and a 3-piece Energon claw accessory. The Rescue Bots Universe Autobot Chase figure is inspired by the character from the Transformers: Rescue Bots animated series and features articulated head, arms, and legs for awesome action poses. Celebrate the last 40 years of Transformers history with Transformers Legacy action figures. Transformers Legacy opens the portal to a whole new universe of -- More Than Meets the Eye -- bringing together every Transformers generation like you’ve never seen before. Collect and combine different characters to create your ideal Legacy lineup. TRANSFORMERS and HASBRO and all related trademarks and logos are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc. © 2024 Hasbro.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 62 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gonna give Chase a 5 star
reviews.reviewText: As a guy that grew up with G1 and Beast Wars, i never cared for Rescue Bots, very cheesey animation and the original toys werent very appealing, obviously made for 3 year olds, my kids didnt care for the show very much either...with that said, this G1-esque Chase is a great buy, design is awesome, he kept the unique toon looking head but got a G1 body design. Stands and transformed easy enough. Very good quality and just a great figure for my boys. I think if you're looking to finally get the rescue bots in a quality design, this is it. Hope to see the rest of them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They did a fantastic job mirroring the cartoon bot design but making it more realistic. The transformation is fairly clever and nice and sturdy. My son loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rescue bots CHASE!
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun figure. it's easy to transform, posing is easy, and looks cool in car mode

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Chase is great
reviews.reviewText: Chase is a great figure. Good build quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really excited for the figure, but QC sucked
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been really excited for this figure since it was revealed and I finally got my hands on the figure yesterday. Out of the box his left arm was super tight and wouldn’t stay up above the shoulder tab. I’ve got a replacement coming so I’m hopeful to see the issues fixed, otherwise the figure looks great and is a great rendition of the original design

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice G1 version of Chase of Rescue bots.
reviews.reviewText: This figure is a nice addition to the updated Transformers line as it tries to combine with the art style of Rescue Bots and G1 style transformers. This is posable. I wished it had wrist articulation to spin its hand in awesome poses. It does have Hot Rod shoulders so posing the shoulders with other deluxe classes are kind of hard to do. Nice posing articulation though and nice ankle articulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very great figure all around
reviews.reviewText: What a fantastic update to a character many grew up with as young children. He looks so nice in both modes and still maintains that fun factor. He’s a joy to transform and so fun to mess with in either mode. If you’re on the fence about this figure, I say go for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As an Original series fan, I love this figure!
reviews.reviewText: This is an wonderful adaptation of a classic character. The figure is obviously made with love and care for the original series. This figure is definitely only for kids 9+, it's transformation is difficult but also very satisfying. All things considered, this figure is amazing! If you loved the original show, you'll love this! -Amanda's son.
A mi niño le gustó mucho
